response:
Neuroimaging is indicated to evaluate the known arachnoid cysts for any interval change or mass effect, and to rule out intracranial pathology given the hypertension and headache. Systemic blood work is required to investigate the hypertension in a young patient and exclude metabolic contributors to fatigue or weakness.

investigations = ["MRI Brain", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Thyroid function tests", "C-reactive protein", "HbA1c", "Renal function tests"]
